name: The State of Mind 1.1
description:
You have been summoned into another world, where everything seems to be normal and exactly the same as in your world - except for one thing. The society is divided into two: the Royal Guard that serves and protects the citizens of Melrichstadt and the rest. They are simply called peasants.

Features

  • You will learn about forbidden magic and summons
  • The game is a psychological thriller
  • Peasants can’t wear clothing (see story)
  • Mind blowing plot
  • What happened to real money in this world?
  • Who is the Royal Guard and why is the society divided?
  • Short and sweet - around 1 hour with replay value
  • Two different endings
  • Daily routine
  • Minigames (Gacha, Pachinko, Chicken Catching)
  • Make your own decisions
  • 'Insight Services' as big data collector

Controls

Arrow keys: move around

Enter or Space: interact

Escape: menu, quit
